title: Scholarship
content: Scholarships Honor System of Students with dedication to public interests and acquisition of all-round capabilityGuided by the Implementation Guidelines of Quality-oriented Education in Nankai University, the Honor System of Students in Nankai University accommodates the requirements of quality-oriented education with dedication to public interests and acquisition of all-round capability, conforms to the law of student personality development and growth, and adapts to the features of different levels and typ
